name: Hoverablepopovers
body: # HoverablePopovers A simple jQuery plugin to make the twitter bootstrap popovers sticky when hovering. ## Usage ``` Trigger popover ``` The hoverablePopover method takes 2 arguments: 1. PopoverOptions
tagline: A simple jQuery plugin to make the twitter bootstrap popovers sticky when hovering.
